gen:link.label:label: Financial statements type indication is required.
Financial statements type indication is limited to values ‘Enkelvoudig’ (Separate) and ‘Geconsolideerd en enkelvoudig’ (Consolidated and separate).
Authority number is required.
Statutory name of entity is required.
Legal form of entity is required.
Chamber of commerce registration number is required.
Sector is required.
Indication whether entity is a joint venture, is required when reporting for educational sectors PO or VO.
Indication whether entity is included in financial reporting of local government, is required when reporting for educational sectors PO or VO.
Indication 'Progressive decentralisation of local government funds' is required for educational sectors PO or VO.
A value for 'Financiën van aan UMC gelieerde medische faculteit opgenomen?' is required if 'Sector' has value 'Scientific education'.
If 'Finances of medical faculty related to university hospital included?' has value 'Yes' heeft, then 'Income total of medical faculty recorded in income statement' must be greater than zero.
If 'Finances of medical faculty related to university hospital included?' has value 'Yes' heeft, then 'Expenses total of medical faculty recorded in income statement' must be greater than zero.
Neither or both start date and end date must be supplied and if supplied the start date must lie before the end date and the period must be different from 01-01-2016 - 31-12-2016.
The start date must lie after January 1 of the previous reporting year and before December 31 of the current reporting year.
The end date must lie within the current reporting year.
Statutory address is required.
Postal address is required.
Email address of contact or administration management office is required.
Entity is required to specify assets total.
Entity is required to specify equity total.
Entity is required to specify equity and liabilities total.
Entity is required to specify whether balance sheet items at year start have been adjusted.
When adjustment of balance sheet items at year start is affirmed, the reason for this adjustment must be disclosed.
Entity is required to specify government contributions total.
Entity is required to specify sum of results in the reporting year.
Entity is required to specify increase or decrease of cash and cash equivalents.
Provisions at period end must correspond with the sumtotal of maturity specification.
Non-current liabilities at period end must correspond with the sumtotal of maturity specification.
Specification of effective interest rate is required in case the end balance of the non-current liability is non-zero.
Effective interest rate must not be less than 0 and not greater than 100.
Liability maturity date must lie after the end of the reporting period if balance at period end is greather than zero.
Interest rate swaps measured at fair value is required in case interest rate risk is covered.
End balance in model 'Balance' and total in 'Segment reporting' must correspond.
Current year actual in 'Income statement' and total in 'Segment reporting' must correspond.
A value for entity interest is required unless the related party is an association or a foundation.
Indication of major investments or fully progressed decentralisation is required.
Specification of values in the Student Financial Support grants overview is required for educational sectors HBO and WO.
Item 'Income, total' and 'Expenses, total' in the estimates for the reporting year must be supplied with a value other than zero.
Legal form 'Besloten vennootschap' (Private limited company) or 'Naamloze vennootschap' (Limited liability company) of a controlling interest implies an entity interest greater than 50%.
Legal form 'Besloten vennootschap' (Private limited company) or 'Naamloze vennootschap' (Limited liability company) of a non-controlling interest implies an entity interest of 50% or less.
At least one activity that characterizes the relationship with a related party, needs to be indicated with value 'Yes'.

The forecast for year 2020 is mandatory if 'Indication of major investments in accomodation or fully progressed decentralisation of accommodation funds' has been affirmed, in which case 'Number of pupils, participants and students on the 1st of October' and 'Staffing total (fte)' must be supplied with a value greater than zero.

The forecast for year 2021 is mandatory if 'Indication of major investments in accomodation or fully progressed decentralisation of accommodation funds' has been affirmed, in which case 'Number of pupils, participants and students on the 1st of October' and 'Staffing total (fte)' must be supplied with a value greater than zero.

The forecast for year 2020 is mandatory if 'Indication of major investments in accomodation or fully progressed decentralisation of accommodation funds' in model 'CP Indicators' has been affirmed, in which case 'Total of assets' and 'Total of equity and liabilities' must be supplied with a value greater than zero.

The forecast for year 2021 is mandatory if 'Indication of major investments in accomodation or fully progressed decentralisation of accommodation funds' in model 'CP Indicators' has been affirmed, in which case 'Total of assets' and 'Total of equity and liabilities' must be supplied with a value greater than zero.

The forecast for year 2020 is mandatory if 'Indication of major investments in accomodation or fully progressed decentralisation of accommodation funds' in model 'CP Indicators' has been affirmed, in which case 'Total of income' and 'Total of expenses' must be supplied with a value greater than zero.

The forecast for year 2021 is mandatory if 'Indication of major investments in accomodation or fully progressed decentralisation of accommodation funds' in model 'CP Indicators' has been affirmed, in which case 'Total of income' and 'Total of expenses' must be supplied with a value greater than zero.

If one of items 'Assets, total = Equity and liabilities, total', 'Difference between equity group movement and sum of results', 'Difference between cash and cash equivalents in balance and in cash flow', 'Difference sum of results', 'Difference share in results of participating interests', 'Difference results attributable to non-controlling interests' of 'Difference between depreciation, amortisation, revaluation and impairments in intangible assets and property, plant and equipment movement and corresponding expenses' has a value other than zero, a 'Discrepancy disclosure' must be supplied.
The name of the audit firm is required.
The name of the auditor is required.
Items required in the specification of equity.
Items required in the specification of provisions.
Items required in the specification of non-current liabilities.
Items required in the specification of related parties with controlling interest of authority.
Items required in the specification of related parties with non-controlling interest of authority or interest in authority.
Items required in the specification of grants without settlement clause (model G1, concise).
Items required in the specification of grants without settlement clause (model G1, comprehensive).
Items required in the specification of terminating grants with settlement clause (model G2A).
Items required in the specification of continuous grants with settlement clause (model G2B).
Items required in the specification of project subsidies (model FSR)
